queries.query:
from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "templogger")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "tempch1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "templogger")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "tempch1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "templogger")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bat")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

spec.description: A collection of temparature data from Temp-Logger
spec.name: Temp-Logger Dashboard
